name: startPermittingProcess
description: From plans to announcement of the permitting process

name: getArchitect
description: An architect is required to assist with the building permit application

name: prepareBuildingPermitApplication
description: Prepare the building permit application

name: prepareDesign
description: Prepare the design of the building

name: prepareRequiredDocuments
description: Prepare other required documents

name: preliminaryInputFromAuthorities
description: Preliminary consultations are held

name: buildingPermitApplicationPrepared
description: The building permit application is prepared

name: submitApplication
description: Submit the building permit applicaton

name: getPermitOfficer
description: A permit officer working at the city administration is assigned

name: preliminaryAuthorityCheck
description: The authority preforms pleliminary checks

name: checkCompleteness
description: Permit officer checks if all required documents are present

name: checkFormat
description: Permit officer checks if all required documents are well formatted

name: performAdministrativeProcesses
description: Administrative processes (e.g. send reception letter)

name: registerProject
description: The project has to be registered

name: allPreliminaryChecksPass
description: All preliminary checks pass

name: announcePermittingProcess
description: Publicly announce the permitting process

name: performContentReview
description: The authority performs a thorough content review and checks

name: consultAgenciesAndDepartments
description: Request agencies and departments for statements when location is in city center

name: locatedInCityCenter
description: The project is located in the city center

name: consultDepartementMobiliteitEnOpenbareWerken
description: Consult the department "Mobiliteit en Openbare Werken"

name: collectStatementsOfAgenciesCity
description: Collect the statements of agencies and departments for the city center

name: locatedInRuralArea
description: The project is located in a rural area

name: consultDepartementNatuurEnBos
description: Consult the department "Natuur en Bos"

name: collectStatementsOfAgenciesRural
description: Collect the statements of agencies and departments for a rural area

name: collectAndDecide
description: From collection neighbour objections to final ratification
